description: This file is a configuration script for Remotion, a video rendering library. It sets default video/image format options, enables overwriting output files, and overrides webpack and Vite dev server configurations to allow permissive CORS by setting appropriate headers.

methods.name: Config.setVideoImageFormat
methods.description: Sets the default video/image format for Remotion output.

methods.name: Config.setOverwriteOutput
methods.description: Configures Remotion to overwrite output files without prompting.

methods.name: Config.overrideWebpackConfig
methods.description: Allows customizing the underlying bundler (webpack or Vite) configuration, here used to set CORS headers for dev servers.
